name: Chomp Monsters
description:
Chomp Monsters!

Chomp some Monsters! Starring two ravenous lovers, Cinnamon and Apple!

18+ for having vore in it and that's about it

We didn't quite finish everything we had planned for this, so the game is still in a bit of a WIP state, but you can still go around and have fun eating (or getting eaten by) some monster fellas!

Controls:

Arrows: Move
Space: Primary Attack / Eat
Z: Special Attack
X: Regurgitate
C: Switch party members
V: Cycle stomach inventory
Esc: Pause game

Credits:

By Canvas and woob (me!)

Designed and developed by Canvas and woob with Godot!
Sprites and monster designs made by Canvas with Aseprite!
Soundtrack made by woob in Jummbox!
Sound effects made by woob in ChipTone!
